name: qr-order-frontend
description: QR Order System - All Frontend Applications

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:guest" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:kitchen" "npm run dev:landing"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:guest && npm run build:admin && npm run build:kitchen && npm run build:landing
scripts.install:all: cd guest && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../kitchen && npm install && cd ../landing && npm install
